dcterms:creator: Christophe Veaux
Junichi Yamagishi
Kirsten MacDonald
dcterms:description: The VCTK-RVA dataset is a manually annotated dataset that details voice characteristic differences among different speakers, specifically focusing on relative voice attribute differences between same-gender speakers.
dcterms:title: VCTK-RVA

dcterms:creator: Christophe Veaux
Junichi Yamagishi
Kirsten MacDonald
dcterms:description: The VCTK (version 0.92) dataset consists of speech sentences from 110 speakers, including 62 females and 48 males, and is widely utilized in voice conversion and text-to-speech studies.
dcterms:title: VCTK (version 0.92)
